title: Albania Beachfront Opulence with Private Beach, Infinity Pool & Wellness Spa
description:
Nestled near the breathtaking Llogara National Park, this beachfront retreat offers a luxury oasis on Albania’s Ionian coast. Every room features sweeping ocean views, while guests can also unwind by the infinity pool, savour elevated poolside cuisine or relax with a treatment at the hotel’s expansive five-level spa.

Step into the rich natural and cultural heritage of the region - hike Caesar’s Pass, explore the ancient ruins of Orikum or visit the UNESCO-listed Gjirokastra Castle. Your gateway to the awe-inspiring Albanian Riviera awaits.
offer_address: AL, Palasë, Green Coast, Vlorë 9425, Albania
